results.title: Le Grand chemin
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Flach Film, Selena Audio Visuel, TFI and Jean-Loup Hubert
results.brief_description: Set in France in 1958, a boy is reluctantly sent to the country to stay with relatives. The boy’s guardians are the rough, alcoholic and violent carpenter called Pelo, and his gallant, fatalistic, protective wife Marcelle. Their broken marriage means that each reacts to the child differently; to Pelo, he is a surrogate son and to Marcelle, he is an outlet for her maternal instincts.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Warner Bros Pictures, Flach Film, Selena Audio Visuel, TFI and Jean-Loup Hubert

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 12
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around the French Customs Office and the docks ending with revision of grammar.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 09
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around a journey by train and a schoolroom. Grammar teaching in this lesson refers to the subjunctive.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 08
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around a bedroom, a bathroom and wearing apparel. The grammar dealt with concerns the perfect participle and omission of articles.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 06
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around a farm and a table menu, stressing negations with and without verbs, and possessive and determinate pronouns.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 05
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around receiving visitors at home and the time, the calendar and seasons of the year. Demonstrative pronouns and adjectives are dealt with in this lesson.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 04
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around a tour of Paris and stresses pronominal adverbs, comparative and superlative adjectives and irregular comparisons.
